buildCommand: curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.16.9-stable.tar.xz | tar xJ && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && flutter build web --release --dart-define=API_URL=https://happy-year-2025-production.up.railway.app
installCommand: curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.16.9-stable.tar.xz | tar xJ && export PATH="$PATH:`pwd`/flutter/bin" && flutter pub get
